name: Deckchair: Healthy Glow
description: A common sight along sun-drenched shores, this lounger, with its vibrant red-and-white stripes, is the perfect companion for many a vacationer seeking rest.\nWhen the moment is just right, sun-kissed enthusiasts recline comfortably upon loungers such as this, embracing the full warmth of the midday sun until a healthy flush touches their skin. For they believe sunlight bestows vitality and strength. Yet one must always remember to turn regularly, lest they be left with a patchwork of uneven tan.
